paper_abstract: The Seventh Artificial Intelligence for Interactive Digital Entertainment Conference (AIIDE-11) was held October 11-14, 2011 at Stanford University, Stanford, California. Two one-day workshops were held on October 11: Intelligent Narrative Technologies, and Artificial Intelligence in the Game Design Process. The highlights of each workshop are presented in this report.
paper_title: Reports on the 2011 AAAI Fourth Artificial Intelligence for Interactive Digital Entertainment Conference Workshops
